text: aur jisane apane maan baap se kaha ki tumhaara bura ho, kya tum mujhe dhamakee dete ho ki main dobaara (kabr se) nikaala jaoonga haaloki bahut se log mujhase pahale guzar chuke (aur koee zinda na hua) aur donon fariyaad kar rahe the ki tujh par vae ho eemaan le aa khuda ka vaayada zaroor sachcha hai to vah bol utha ki ye to bas agale logon ke afasaane hain
